Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-285, see notes following § 6-1061.02.

DC CODE § 6-1061.04

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor may make a one-time transfer of $4 million from the Housing Production Trust Fund to such accounts or sub-accounts as may be established pursuant to the trust agreement to be entered into pursuant to 6-1061.02(e).

(1) The Mayor may make a one-time transfer of $1 million from the industrial revenue bond special account established under § 47-131(c)(4) to such accounts or sub-accounts as may be established pursuant to the trust agreement to be entered into pursuant to 6-1061.02(e). The funds transferred pursuant to this subsection may be used to assist eligible households whose annual incomes do not exceed 120% of the area median income.
For the purposes of this subsection, the terms "area median income" and "eligible households" shall have the same meanings as provided in § 42-2801.
